News.Title: Kapston Services Shares Jump 6% on 1:2 Bonus Issue Approval
News.Summary: Kapston Services Limited approved a 1:2 bonus issue, with shares jumping 5.69% to Rs. 433.50. The facilities management company reported 25.30% revenue growth and 79.64% net profit increase in Q2 FY26.

News.Title: Kapston Services Reports Strong Q2 Performance with 79% Jump in Net Profit
News.Summary: Kapston Services reported quarterly EBITDA of 99 million rupees compared to 73 million rupees in the same period last year. The company's EBITDA margin improved to 4.7% from 4.3% year-over-year. Consolidated net profit increased significantly to 70 million rupees from 39 million rupees in the previous year, representing a 79% growth.

News.Title: Kapston Services Reports Strong Q1 Growth with 85% Jump in Net Profit
News.Summary: Kapston Services delivered robust quarterly results with net profit surging to 61 million rupees from 33 million rupees year-over-year, representing an 85% increase. Revenue grew significantly to 1.9 billion rupees compared to 1.5 billion rupees in the same period last year, marking a 27% rise. EBITDA improved to 91 million rupees from 65 million rupees year-over-year, while EBITDA margin expanded to 4.78% from 4.24% in the previous year.
